name: Idle: Generators
description:
Idle: Generators is a simple but really addictive idle game. Take dozen generators under your control and improve them to get the highest profit. Rules are simple: generators produce generators and use them for upgrades.
Buy upgrades and use two separate prestige systems to get powerful improvements. Each upgrade and generator matters. Each prestige restart will make you stronger and improve your income.

Features:
  • Addictive idle gameplay
  • Various upgrades for generators
  • Two prestige systems with progress reset
  • Possibility to complete the game
  • Minimalistic UI and graphics
  • Calm ambient music
  • Steam achievements and global leaderboard
  • Dark theme and numbers different display options

Idle: Generators is a game to relax. But it's still hardcore enough to challenge you. Try it now and have fun!
